eventParts.text: Hey, what’s wrong? You’ve been looking glum all day.
It’s not silly if it’s making you sad!
I guess… I guess I just miss my family and the farm.
I miss my family too, that’s not silly.

Everything was so simple back at the farm. Everybirdy was neutral and you knew what everybirdy was like. Birds didn’t change emotions very often. Out here everything is constantly changing. It’s a lot to take in.

eventConsequence.selectionText: I get it, Terry. You’re used to a neutral life at a small farm, and adventuring like this must be very different. It’s alright if you miss it.
I know you miss the farm, but adventuring is pretty fun too, right? If you hadn’t joined us, you might never have known what feeling friendly is like!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah, I guess you’re right. Feeling friendly is pretty neat!

Terry gains +2 social!
